Tree Branch.Description: A sturdy tree branch that can be used for crafting.

Iron Sword.Description: Quite a rusty sword, but should be able to get the job done.

Barbarian Shield.Description: Wooden shield with a red windmill on a yellow field painted on it.

Barbarian Helmet.Description: Rudementary leather helmet with two animal horns protruding.

Barbarian Shoulders.Description: Rudementary leather shoulders, slightly oversized and keep slipping.

Barbarian Chest.Description: Rudementary leather chest, snug fit, smells of wet grass.

Barbarian Trousers.Description: Rudementary leather trousers, they squeak when wet.

Barbarian Boots.Description: Rudementary leather boots, but extremely comfortable.

Barbarian Bracers.Description: Rudementary leather bracers, useful but hot and sweaty.

Barbarian Belt.Description: Rudementary leather belt, perfect for keeping up the trousers.

Barbarian Back.Description: Rudementary leather cloak, very warm, but does smell of wet dog when it gets wet.

Barbarian Gloves.Description: Leather gloves, stitched together with fine thread.
